msg: Added some tests proving that EntityManager is injectable without @PersistenceContext.

author: not
msg: ARIES-660 Various build file updates including:
1. Update the svn:ignore for application-distro, application-isolated-distro and application-tooling-repository-generator
2. Update the pom for application-tooling-repository-generator to pull in 0.4-SNAPSHOT of proxy since 0.3.1-SNAPSHOT no longer exists
3. Add some modules to the application pom.xml
4. Update the application-isolated-distro pom.xml so its description is different to application-distro.
5. Update the applciation-noop-resolver pom.xml so its description is different to application-obr-resolver.
